title: Why can Ekko be kited so easily?
body:
Why can't he lock down an ad carry or a sqishy in a 1v1 unless hes fed. He's an assassin and he can be kited so easily? What about champions like {{champion:238}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:84}}  , all assassins that can easily reach their opponent. I hate playing Ekko he needs a rework his kit is so bad and its so annoying to play him.

The issue is... if he cant one shot you with his EQ combo, he gets kited then hes dead, or he just has to ult.

Increase his dash range or allow his E to apply a slow??
PLease riot!!

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/JjrxKAur-ekko-needs-a-rework-asap

replies.body: Ekko can win you a game with a big W play and that is far flashier and less toxic than what other assassins (ult-kill you) can do.  So eventually when other bursty stuff fades from meta, Ekko will still be around doing his thing.

You have a slow, Ekko's passive speeds him up when he procs it AND you have a stun on top of that, while his E's cooldown is rather low once you put a few points in it and have CDR.

Ekko's kit is fine. You are asking for Riot to break him. Ekko's consistently been balanced since Riot nerfed Tankko out of existence (considering his last actual nerf was well over two years ago).

If you want a slow on top of your slow, buy a Rylais.
Its Tekko not Tankko ugh! haha anyways Ekko is fine with his kit only thing that was super annoying was when Jhin was running Mach 5 around the map and could 2 shot you, but that has been fixed.
slows dont stack though. frozen mallet would work due to his e not being a slow but a empowered auto.
I meant outside of his Q. All of Ekko's abilities will apply spell effects.
i thought his e is a empowered auto though? since he teleport punches them and it requires the godly "right click".
Yeah it is. But it also applies spell effects and will apply Rylai's slow as well.

The main Issue occurs when a champion only has 1 damage source. His ultimate is ruled out in a quick 1v1 becuase its 4 seconds behind him, so he is left with his 3 hit passive. It either kills the enemy or it doesnt then he has to wait 5 seconds where he will ultimately just die, most of the time he cant even ult if he's cced. ALL the other assassins have kits that yell Damage. Zed has his WEQ combos, and his Ult. Katarina has her passive, her dagger, and her ult, leblanc has her q, w, AND R. Why is ekko the only assassin that is 3 hit based? Only other champ I can think of with a 3 hit passive for damage is vayne and guess what IT HAS NO COOLDOWN XDD.

ekko can knock out midlane to lower degree after the season changes. with champions like brand and yasou doing so much late game damage the only way is to counter jungle and get early kills or he gets stuffed.
this sounds like a you problem
This sounds like a personal problem with you not knowing how to play him.

Have you guys tried playing an Ekko into a Vayne or a Caitlyn. Its either you one shot them or you die. Zed, katarina, and mony other assassins can do this easily with their several gap closers. I just wish Ekko's E wasnt his only form of engage, dashing in makes you very vulnerable to crowd control. Ad carries like caitlyn have high range and your E will never even be in range so you will get kited! They call Ekko an assassin but hes not living up trust me I play so many games and he''s only useful when he has a lead unlike Zed or Katarina who still easily 1 shot on adc from behind. I simple fix is for his E range to increase as he levels it up just saying.
Oh vayne she has low range for a adc. Your q can catch her if you e instantly then q then auto teleport then go passive after your 3 hits assuming you do this instantly you can dip then repeat.

Dude Ekko's Q is an AOE slow. Vayne easily dashes out of the Q and she continually kites you back. Then all she has to do is press E and you cannot proc your passive you either have to waste your ult or die. I think the problem with ekko is that his burst takes too much time you can only 3-hit a champion so fast. With Zed or Katarina(mid assasins) its just straight burst and they have soo many gap closers and they will never be kited. Ekko's E is just so bad theres no range on that thing.

I agree. Although others can't really know unless they play him & see his efficiency relaative to assassins that are actyually good, otherwise they just say he's annoying & therefore it's somehow okay that he's a pretty bad champion.
Thank you i hate seeing the ignorance on the forums xD

Ekko has a slow, a stun, a ms steroid and 2 dashes. 

If you are having problems sticking to a target with THAT much, that’s more of a player problem than a champion problem.

lol when you say it like that it makes it seem broken, but his stun is stupid hard to land, his slow is meh, and his MS steroid and 2 dashes are conditional. I am an Ekko main and I think the kit is fine, but the way you describe it makes it sounds broken AF.

The slow is good af. 
His ms steroid isn’t that hard to proc, considering his autos apply and his q can apply twice. 
His 2 dashes are not conditional. The first one happens on command with no channel, and the other is attached to a increased range auto attack which, seeing as you want to get closer anyway, you’ll be using on them.

His slow is not Good AF its ok. The movement speed bonus can be hard to land for many reasons pending on champions you are going up against. Anyone with hard CC can stop you from proccing your passive quite easily. As for 2 dashes 1 is conditional lol if you use E which is the short part of his dash btw and there is nothing in range for your second dash you cannot do it thus being conditional. This is also very telegraphed until Ekko gets his Protobelt then it becomes much easier to get in range. Alot of champions has the same base move speed as him too which really sucks (brand, Zoe, Xerath, and others which should not move faster than a melee assassin but do for some reason makes this hard to land) Also Since most of these champs can easily stun you once your dash towards them then you are in a world of hurt if you do not play it correctly. This is Ekkos biggest weakness if you catch him Mid dash and without him proccing his passive you have a champion that cannot do ANYTHING to attack or get away. So let's not play this game like I said I dont think Ekko is anywhere near UP, but you make it sound like he is broken.

Its so much different when its Melee vs Ranged. To be cucked before you can reach an opponent isn't really counterplay its basically an exploit especially with point and click CC abilities. With MF if you ult while in range of Draven E then that is your fault, but if a Melee champ cannot reach their opponent it just feels unfair whether its counterplay or not. the other is building a whole item to counter someone and that is completely different again. Not really counterplay when you are prevented from doing anything due to a point and click CC ability more or less it just feels like you are getting outplayed by an unfair ability and not the "skill" of someone.

If you played Ekko you would know that oftenly you try to E and go for a trade but the enemy champion is just on the outskirts of your E radius and you cannot teleport to them. Also Ekko is the only mid lane assassin who literally has to dive in head first to go for a trade, making him vulnerable and prone to cc and this is NOT the case for every mid laner. Zed has a quick 0 animation teleport with his W making trades quick and efficient. Leblanc can literally dive in and go back to her original position dodging all crowd control coming towards her. Katarina has a quick blink that enemies wont see come so even if she does get CCed, she has low cooldowns on her Shunpo allowing her to return to safety or pick up daggers continually chasing down the enemy. I could go on with every mid lane assassin but I think you get the point.

I don't think that's the case, cuz if it was, why was he in the bloodmoon assassin event where you could only play assassins? They would address something as simple as that I would think. Even so, all the champions above assassinate btter than Ekko apart from maybe Fiora.

What u seemingly want (straight burst 100-0) is anathema to what Ekko essentially was designed to be.  He’s a skirmisher, he thrives in prolonged fights.   It’s obly if he’s really ahead that he will straight up delete.   Other than that... ur not playing him properly, his W is lockdown enough (aoe stun that shields) .  His Q has quite decent range and also slows, W has a big range both on cast and the zone itself, slows, shields, and stuns providing u predicted/manipulated events for u to get in position, E is a decent sized dash and blink, ult is a tp that does massive damage and heals. You can set it up in advance so it’ll hit enemies, or u can just use it as an escape.   It also procs w’s stun.    A good Ekko works best not on reacting, but by predicting and/or directing people into where he wants them to be.
you mean hes a trading damage type champion? how do you land your stun effectively i feel i always miss it almost as if they know where my skill shot is going.

Eh, ish... ur supposed to try to minimize the damage ur taking, with the ult being supplemental to recovering any health lost from too hard an engage... thereby giving u a second chance.   The W is really moreso how you are able to predict how the opponent will move.   Either that, or u force/trick ur opponent into moving into the zone.   Observe how the enemy moves and make a guess as to where is the best place to place W... eventually learn it by the practice.
Hes more of a fighter assassin type thats supposed to take damage so why do people go pure ap on him but not fighter/ap builds like rod of ages zhonyas

Most people go zhonyas.  RoA takes a while to reach max efficiency and he generally prefers different items: Lichbane, protobelt/hextech, zhonyas are the core items. which are AP bruiser/assassin items.  Ekko then generally either builds somewhat tanky, or continues full ap: Rabadons and voidstaff.   People go pure ap because he's still an assassin and has huge ratios on his abilities.

here is a cool trick you can use if you are having trouble locking people down. If the enemy is at least pretty AD heavy after Protobelt and Lich back pick up a dead mans plate (adds more damage to your E, gives a slow, and you move even faster) I wouldnt suggest it unless the enemy team is heavy on the AD side though. Other than that you can get a dark seal early and if you get 10 stacks after you have protobelt and Lich Bane you can upgrade to Mejais and no one can catch you or get away from you.

His W stuns.

His E dashes him and lets him teleport to a target.

His passive gives him a speed boost when he hits a champion three times.

How are people kiting you? Are you not using your abilities? 

Take Phase Rush if you're really having issues.

Ekko trades raw burst damage for sustained damage. That's always been his thing. He can't 100-0 people, but he can stay in the fight longer than other assassins and keep dishing out damage.

Except he doesn't really. I always found his sustained damage (at least now), useless because they nerfed his passive to a 5 second cd, I dunno if you play him but from what I've found 5 seconds in a fight is a pretty long time. His Q isn't a stand alone ability, as in you cannot rely on it for damage, it is short range, telegraphed & takes a noticeable while for it to return back to Ekko - Where it does the most damage. It is solely an avenue for his passive & kiting really. You can only really jump on a target via your E at which point you're very prone to CC & the like, at which point you can't even ult. He has no reset function, high Cds, telegraphed & unreliable abilities & they don't really do much for him despite being easy to dodge/predict. He scales well, yes, but his early game sucks & for the competition in late game I don't think it is worth lengthening games to have a late game that is on the level of a mage if not slightly worse.

I'm not saying you can't do well as Ekko & I have stopmed as him but it is obvious to me that in higher levels of play I don't think he is an even decent pick unless he inherently counters a comp / enemy laner.

He only really has one engage tool & that's his E. I've often found it annoying that he doesn't feel much like an assassin, but I don't know what they can do or what they should change about him without breaking him or reducing his efficiency as a character that has a lot of his kit tied into his lore.
